Lago - Data Scientist - European Union - full-time - REMOTE or in-person in Paris, France - https://www.getlago.com/

Lago is the leading open-source usage based billing API and is serving companies such as Mistral.ai, Groq, Together. We’re backed by YC, FirstMark Capital, Clement Delangue (Hugging Face), Romain Huet (OpenAI).

We’re looking for our first Data Scientist, to leverage the usage/consumption/payment data we produce and build data-oriented features for our customers.

We can sponsor visas in France. If you live in another country in the European Union, we’re open to it (as long as the timezone is +2/-2h from Paris) but unfortunately cannot sponsor the visa.

Github: https://github.com/getlago/lago
